author: ArcOnyx
description: Access entities from all your Kanka campaigns in Discord.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing KankaView! This ties into the API for Kanka, a fantastic worldbuilding and campaign management tool. You can find it here: https://kanka.io
Be aware that you'll need to set an application token to use the API - you can get tokens from your profile page on the site.
name: KankaView
